json.instructionContext1: Player gets the seed during the game, every spin, the seed grows.
json.instructionContext2: Once the crops are mature, the player can harvest them. And if player collects to MAX, then player can sell them.
json.featureContext1: Player could choose odds of bonus and free spin times before entering Free game.
json.featureContext2:
When player is in the bonus game, will go steal the crops of off-line players' farm.
If player is on-line, the bonus game will be ended compulsively.
Every farm could be stolen 3 crops at most , and player could steal 5 players at most.
json.wildContext: Wild: Substitute any symbols except Free and Bonus symbols
json.bonusContext: Bonus: Three Free symbols, enter Free game.
json.freeContext: Free: Three Bonus symbols, enter Bonus game.
json.disconnectMsg: Connection lost, press confirm and re-connect
